Detailed Description

Implementation of the standard mkdir command.

This program takes in one or more directory names as input and creates all the directory(only if non-existent). Given a directory path if a directory of higher rank in the path doesn't exist it creates that first and then creates the next one.

Author:
Bishal Santra
